summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed recipient to appear and testify in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell on November 29, 2021. The subpoena is signed by U.S. Attorney Damian Williams.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case (United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)) for which testimony is being compelled.

persons.name: Damian Williams
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed and issued the subpoena.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Testimony
events.description: The subpoena commands the recipient to appear in court to testify and give evidence in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 318, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on November 15, 2021, compelling an unnamed individual to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case.
The testimony was scheduled for November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York.
The subpoena was issued by U.S. Attorney Damian Williams, indicating active prosecution efforts in late 2021.
The case referenced is United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
Failure to comply with the subpoena would constitute contempt of court and subject the recipient to sanctions and penalties.
